title: Neep help starting up League
body: So i came home from school to hop onto my computer and play some league with friends. When I started it up, I just got the logo that it makes when you normally start it up and then i waited a couple of minutes and nothing happened. I have tried reinstalling the launcher many times and I couldn't think of anything else to do. I would really appreciate it if someone could steer me in the right direction of fixing this, as I'm pretty bored and I just wanna play with my friends

replies.body:
1) Go to C:\Windows\system32\drivers\etc
2) Open "host" file

Make sure your localhost is 127.0.0.1

If you have anything else below that, it's the issue that is preventing the patcher from opening and closing out automatically. Just delete everything below the localhost.
when I open the host file it asks me how I want to open it, then when I do it says it's just an example? and I cant make any changes to it.
Take all my RP

YES this worked ,my localhost was 0.0.0 i think that's also the reason for other internet problems i've had lately ,
guys you may want to copy the host file to another location change it then save it and copy it back ,cus windows won't let you save directly on the origin location
GIVE THIS MAN SOME RP

Unfortunately, mine was already at the correct number so there must be a problem somewhere else. I just really hope I can find it soon since I am having some league withdrawls xD - not really - but I wanna get back to playing some Yasuo mid with my friends.

there's more than one ,make sure ,just saying ,the last one is the one that was changed for me

localhost name resolution is handled within DNS itself.
#	127.0.0.1       localhost
#	::1             localhost
# Start of Entries made by A1C V1x0r's cs5 Activator 
127.0.0.1 localhost

Hey guys!


I wanted to update this, since I was unable to last night. Please refer to [this Discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ERAqgjGs-bug-my-patcher-will-not-open-after-patch-421) for help on how to resolve this patcher issue!
Idk even know if this is a bot - If not, I would love to thank you even if it doesn't work, Im just downloading the fixit thing.
{{champion:53}} I AM NOT A ROBOT{{champion:53}}
{{champion:112}} Join the Glorious (Robot) Evolution!{{champion:112}}
So you're definitely not Blitzcrank?? You must be Thresh then.
I LOVE YOU - IT WORKED :D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D - Am i supposed to somehow close the thread now? And if so, how do I do that?
xD

Hey guys,

There are a couple of things that can be contributing to League not opening. First off, make sure you're running in Administrative mode! You can do this by:

- Right-Clicking the League Launcher
- Click Run as Administrator

If that does not function properly, make sure that your firewall isn't blocking the game from launching. [This Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#jwq2) will show you how to configure your firewall to work with League.

And Finally, make sure you're not running any Third Party Programs (Like LolRecorder, Curse Voice etc.) as they can affect your patcher. If you are running them, please disable them and try to launch the game again!
what about mac users, a lot of us seem to be having problems with the lol launcher today as well.
You can find the Mac instructions by scrolling to the top of the guide Digital Ram linked and clicking on the Mac button.
Already have, I just said to hell with it and submitted a ticket, the guide didn't help me or the others with the same problem.
That is how I felt about the guides for windows :P

I have tried this myself, and it still refuses to work. 
I have had a clean install of league since zac's release, no custom skin, no lolrecorder, no curse voice, razer comms, nothing extra.

The guide you have linked to has failed to resolve any issues since the start of this problem. The support personnel I had contact with suggested that exact same guide, as well as another solutions page with patcher related issues and still to no success.

I sincerely hope this gets resolved soon. Because it doesn't seem like it's an issue on the consumer's end. 
I suspect a new code, or activity that the client is doing which certain versions of windows do not particularly like, which is leading to these issues.
I completed all of the steps above, but nothing has changed and the patcher still won't load. Hoping for a fix soon as League of Legends works on my laptop but not my home computer.
I have done all of those things. I even un-installed and re-installed. League worked fine for me yesterday and now it wont even open.

None of that helped and now that I have been following some guides, they have led me to a corrupted rads_user_kernel.exe file which just pops up in the right of my taskbar and I cannot do anything to access it. It says to run the Chkdsk Utility on windows but it does nothing. I would really just love to fresh install the game but I can't access the patcher even if I uninstall and re-install from the wizard.

80% of all guides and stuff do not fix anything for people.

All you give is those two tips and a bad guide that 90% of people have done? 

This is why Riot is failing..
I was also curious if it would be bad to just delete my Riot Games folder under my C hard drive, then just try and run the wizard and install it again.

Same exact issue. I've been all over the goddamned internet looking for answers since early this morning (EST). I've tried every single fix mentioned here as well as everywhere else, and absolutely nothing has worked.

**To explain the issue plainly.**

* I click on League to open it, and the league of legends logo pops up. After a few moments it disappears.
* When I click on league with the task manager open to what's going on, the kernel and launcher both appear in processes, and then disappear after a moment.
* After uninstalling, restarting, reinstalling, restarting, and then opening the game the logo stays and it begins to download content in the bar loader beneath the logo. It downloads, or so it would seem, and then the logo disappears, same as before.

**To explain all the fixes I've gone through.**

1. ALL of them
2. Yes I'm sure. ALL of them.

i have tried the registry fix as mentioned below. I have tried reinstalling properly. I have tried running anything that can launch in the riot folder as administrator at one time or another. I have turned off my firewall and tried running the launcher as admin. I have tried compatibility modes. I have tried around 30 different fixes all varying in their ingenuity and the problem persists.

What would be greeeeeeat is if someone from riot could comment publicly as to what the fuck is going on so if this issue has to do with their servers or patches and is not a client side issue we could save our time and wait until they fix it.

I literally have the same problem :( I have tried everything. un installing, re installing, deleting stuff then restarting. nothing works. I've spent money on this account and I don't want to lose it.
I think it is more so just the client/patcher that isn't working but I think the accounts will be fine.
If it doesn't work on my Computer, Then I can no longer play, Then I lose my account because it's of no use to me. See my problem?
I see where you are coming from now. I originally thought that you could just get into the launcher but you couldn't log in. My bad :D
Having the same issue. Startup league, I get the splash logo, then everything ends. I don't even get any League related services starting up in program manager.
Yeah when I start it up, I can see the process in the task manager although nothing happens and I am just forced to close it or else nothing will happen. :(
i used to have that problem lol, you have to wait and thats it. c: patience my friend is a great virtue.
Wow. Someone who has patience for this game. I thought I was the only one. Everyone else I know likes to rush things. Are you real

First, make sure your local host is 127.0.0.1 (look at OtimusXai comment, it will give you steps for this. It works very well)
Second, try running as administrator. You need admin abilities on your account, but this has worked for me many times (re-installing usually does not work, unfortunately). I hope this helps (because LoL is best)!
i am having all the same problems on windows as well riot please fix

You and me both, I click on league and the splash pops up and closes.

Was monitoring rads_user_kernel.exe in my Task Manager, and it just force closes itself.  Then nothing.
I'm having a similar problem. I click on the shortcut and I get a message says that the PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working.
Same issue. Starting in admin doesn't help.
i cant log in now, i am stucked. it says logging on... i still wait
